data.name: Google - Fix menu accessibility
data.description: Early april, google changed some parameters in its stylesheet. Since then, when accessing the "Settings" menu on google search homepage, some of the items can be unclickable depending on the size of the window. It's due to the fact that in html the form is taking the whole width of the page and is displayed over the menu. In the screenshot I've set a red background, partially transparent, to the form. You can see that it overlaps the menu (opaque yellow background). When this fix is applied, the menu is displayed in front and is clickable. For more styles, userscripts, extensions, tips, ..., go to http://users.skynet.be/alternity/programming/

data.description:
Тёмная тема для электронного дневника. Дизайн большинства элементов изменён на тёмные аналоги. Внимание: корректная работа данной темы гарантируется только при использовании Сетевого города в режиме ученика!

data.name: YouTube Throwback (2014-2017) (NOT FINISHED!)
data.description: YouTube has announced in February 2020 that they would be removing their old UI. Several iterations of this UI have been used since 2013 with the introduction of the Channel One layout. This layout brings back the look of the old layout.
